script.dialog: You are here!    |L|I can't believe it!    |L|The device must have worked!
And you came all this way?
Did you come here to help me?
Of course you did! Why else would you be here?
Perhaps curiosity?
I hope you'll help me anyway.|!||L|I don't know what else I can do.
This device lets me communicate with you through my dreams.
For the signal to have even reached you, it must have gone an impossible distance!
But then again, that distance was probably nothing to someone like you.
I want to ask you so many questions, but the device only works one way,   I think.
My father made it, but I don't really know how to use it properly.
It's fine though.    |L|I have a lot of time to figure it out.
Dreaming is really the only thing I can do these days.
I did something very      silly.
It caused a lot of problems for everyone I love, and probably the whole world too... maybe.
Alright, that last part might have been an exaggeration.
I really hope you can understand me.
I know you have the capacity to love.|L|I could not be talking to you otherwise... At least I hope so.
I need you to tell her something.|L||!|I need you to tell her to move on.
I would do it myself, but...|L|That's impossible now.
Find a way to reach her!|L|Tell her that I sent you!|L|Please, tell her that I am okay!
Tell Her |ai||lu||za||ai||L||!|Oh no!
The Signal |nah||ze||-||ter||vai|
|..||..||ai||rah||ai||za| help her!
